subject: Football
College Athletics
Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)
lead_paragraph: Andrew Hatch’s winding road through the world of college football has led him from B.Y.U. to Harvard, to L.S.U. and finally back to Harvard, where he must start over again.
snippet: Andrew Hatch’s winding road through the world of college football has led him from B.Y.U. to Harvard, to L.S.U. and finally back to Harvard, where he must start over again.
